name: Santa Vs. Zombies
description:
Play as Santa and deliver presents, each present you deliver will turn a citizen into a zombie. Each zombie has its own skill that'll make the play arena more dangerous and harder to navigate. When no citizen is left without a present you'll win, but be careful, later stages zombies are more powerful.
You can chose between 6 different skills to make your mission easier.
This game was solo developed but it uses some assets from the asset store and from sketchfab, every artist has been credited in the credits menu.
